dmg.description:
Patch v1.2 Notes: -------------------- * Updated Classic Mode Bugs * Fixed Sky Zone's Loading Bug * Fixed bugs for Event Matches * Online now has sound effects for join requests, declines, and disconnections * Other misc. balancing tweaks
Content:
* Delphino's Secret Added * 7 Characters Added * Added Crystal Smash to Stadium mode * Sky Zone Revamped * Smashville Revamped * Other and More Stage Tweaks
Engine:
* Auto Updater for PM:FE * Characters now go into landing animation when melee airdodging * Engine Knockback Increased by 1 unit * Replays are now named "PMFE Replay" instead of the default "Untitled Replay" * Miscellaneous bug fixes and balancing

exe.description:
Patch v1.2 Notes: -------------------- * Updated Classic Mode Bugs * Fixed Sky Zone's Loading Bug * Fixed bugs for Event Matches * Online now has sound effects for join requests, declines, and disconnections * Other misc. balancing tweaks
Content:
* Delphino's Secret Added * 7 Characters Added * Added Crystal Smash to Stadium mode * Sky Zone Revamped * Smashville Revamped * Other and More Stage Tweaks
Engine:
